Class TransactionHistoryTableRenderer

java.lang.Object
plasystem_functions.TransactionHistoryTableRenderer
public class TransactionHistoryTableRenderer extends Object
Custom renderer for the transaction history table in the PlaSystem application. Configures column widths, applies decimal formatting to amount columns (Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given), and sets alignment (left for ID, right for amounts).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    TransactionHistoryTableRenderer.DecimalFormatRenderer
    Custom renderer to format numeric values to two decimal places in table cells.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    applyColumnAlignment()
    Applies alignment to columns: left for the ID column, right for the amount columns (Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given).
    private void
    applyColumnWidths()
    Applies custom column widths, setting a minimal fixed width for the ID column and distributing the remaining width equally among other columns.
    private void
    applyDecimalFormatting()
    Applies decimal formatting to the amount columns (Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given) using a custom DecimalFormatRenderer to display values with two decimal places.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionHistoryTableRenderer

      public TransactionHistoryTableRenderer(JTable table, int tableWidth)
      Constructs a TransactionHistoryTableRenderer to initialize rendering for the specified table. Applies custom column widths, decimal formatting, and alignment based on the provided table width.
      Parameters:
      table - The JTable to render. Must not be null and must have at least 6 columns (ID, Date, Time, Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given).
      tableWidth - The preferred width of the table in pixels. Should be positive.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if table or its column model is null.

  • Method Details

    • applyColumnWidths

      private void applyColumnWidths()
      Applies custom column widths, setting a minimal fixed width for the ID column and distributing the remaining width equally among other columns. Assumes the table has at least 6 columns (ID, Date, Time, Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the table's column model is null.

    • applyDecimalFormatting

      private void applyDecimalFormatting()
      Applies decimal formatting to the amount columns (Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given) using a custom DecimalFormatRenderer to display values with two decimal places.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the table's column model is null.

    • applyColumnAlignment

      private void applyColumnAlignment()
      Applies alignment to columns: left for the ID column, right for the amount columns (Total Amount, Payment Amount, Change Given). Uses a left-aligned renderer for the ID column and a right-aligned DecimalFormatRenderer for the amount columns.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the table's column model is null.
